query:
UPDATE employees 
SET active = 0 
WHERE id IN (
  WITH RECURSIVE subordinates AS (
    SELECT id 
    FROM employees 
    WHERE employeeCode = '2184889' AND active = 1
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT e.id
    FROM employees e
    INNER JOIN subordinates s ON e.managerId = s.id
    WHERE e.active = 1
  )
  SELECT id FROM subordinates
);

    SELECT e.id
    FROM employees e
    INNER JOIN subordinates s ON e.managerId = s.id
